description:
Season: 20
Original Air Date: 11/07/2006

Ridge is happy Brooke is working at Forrester Creations again. Brooke is still determined to not get involved in a relationship with Ridge. Brooke tells Stephanie that Nick has gone to Storm for legal advice. Nick tells Jackie that he confronted Stephanie. He introduces her to Storm and they discuss a potential trial. Jackie suggests that they take Forrester Creations. Later, Nick tells Stephanie, Eric, and Ridge that they must sell him Forrester Creations or Stephanie goes to jail. Harry visits Taylor to tell her his is worried about Phoebe.  He feels that Phoebe should stay away from Shane. Shane flirts with Phoebe who is a bit uncomfortable.  Phoebe agrees to go to dinner with Shane the following evening.
